messages: hi italy just opening up communication and i want to know what some of your initial thoughts on the game are and ifhow we can work together
wellthats a great question and a lot of it comes down to how free ill be left to play in the west no

well if you want to attack france in the mediterranean while i attack through burgundy you can have marseille and iberia while i take brest and paris then with france out of the way you could focus on turkey or austria sound fair
hello im just asking about your move to tyrolia its making me more than a little concerned
totally understandable but did you notice the attempt at trieste tyrolia is the natural support position for that attempt

messages: hey italy whats your plan for the game
bongiorno to crush my enemies see them driven before me and hear the lamentations of their women i mean umm not really sure yet pondering whether or not to make an early play around munich

id personally rather you didnt because a play around munich is also a play around trieste and vienna ive heard that theres some rancor over in the west and you might be able to profit from a mobbed france if you went that way
good to know thanks
well that went well shall we push on with the ways we started
well the west and east are both an unholy mess now second fleet incoming i assume you agree we need to nip that turkish issue in the bud before it becomes unmanageable
sowas that a no
indeed
peccato i was really hoping we could bring order or at least mutual profit out of the chaos
sorry we couldnt patch things up

messages: hello italy just wanted to thank you for your gift to the culinary world and wish you a good game
just to be clear that was all in a pasta life
from this one interaction alone i trust you please dont betray me and make me eat dish of regretti and meatballs
history: hello italy just wanted to thank you for your gift to the culinary world and wish you a good game

messages: we both hate how i vs t just slows us both down right why do we have to be the slow powers in this game i say we dont lets be unconventional i have done fun it alliances before but it all depends on making it work let me know if you have any thoughts or want to just see how the first few seasons roll out or if there are things youd like to see from me
i mean if im free to go another direction ill take it in a heartbeat and i doubt youll be very upset at my opening moves
his dots are closer to you
hahahahaha really
if austria retreats to one of your centers i guess it means they dont care about trying to repair anything with you and just loves them dots yeah

i may be able to hit tri in the fall which would cut its ability to support ven by the way if ion retreats to adr that may not help you but if it retreats to tun or nap it would i guess lets see how the retreats go

so now his dots are a lot closer to you than mine are im guessing youre ordering into trieste anyway to protect serbia while you take greece with bulgaria and aegean so the question is what is ion doing
its at your disposal if you want support into tunis if thats what youre getting at
oh come now its much more amusing to support you into tunis that advances the positions rather than retards them
bwa are you serious im not one to look a gift horse in the mouth but i feel like im greedy enough stabbing austria for 3

any other arrangement opens me for a stab and sets us up for conflict tunis is better for you than naples and its a lot better for me to have you there with a path forward than tied up with me if you feel bad about it support me to trieste
ok thats totally sensible logic i may end up having to pass up on greece and catch it next year i can support you into trieste if youd rather have that than retaking venice sure
oh nevermind you can get both nice
unless gre taps ser in which case you still recapture ven and austria is stranded in tri
correct which is what im expecting but i can hope for trieste
you heartless bastard i cant believe you took him from 5 to 0
it was kinder this way put em out of their misery yknow
lol probably that is the great thing about austria you either do well or you get to go play another game
yep im finishing up game 10 of this series now as austria currently on 14 centers but england has tunis so no win for me
ah well so whats the plan from here how far are you planning on riding that juggernaut
well i want to see russia moves hard on germany if they do well i have a history of jumping on big openings yknow otherwise fleets are heading toward gibraltar
sounds fun
also weirdly my phone doesnt seem to be updating me with latest messages the way it should so i end up seeing these a lot later than i should
so i tried to move towards a more forward position so i could fight france an d stab russia and not fight you but youre kinda putting yourself directly in my way yknow
i couldve kept you out of ion permanently but that wasnt what i thought was very interesting long term

yeah i wasnt seeing any response from you so i moved to defend were having some communication issues based on mistiming i think cost us most of a turn but we have the weekend to work out a way forward nu
sure understood how about this to fix it tys s tunwes iontun you take back a dot but we push the position forwards toward iberia
are you still not getting any messages from me
that could definitely work and it does advance the positions
otherwise this game is going to be a long unpleasant slog
i get your messages fine on the computer its the phone that seems to not update properly for some reason i just hadnt checked the computer yesterday as i should have
ok france has told me outright theyre wanting to make sure that italy is divided fairly so i doubt theyll expect me pushing past you toward the west
looks that way yes

its too bad we cant find a way to work together to force me out into mao instead of whittling down your defenses season by season once you lose a center this is going to crumble really quickly but id totally be willing to try something else even though we both didnt do what we said we do last season
aye its not a great plan to just turtle up and try to outlast the juggernaut would love to see or be shown a better option

yeah for this season theres no point in trying to negotiate something the risk is too high for you on a fall turn but maybe once youre turtled up and were looking at a slightly safer spring move we can discuss some way to slingshot me past you
absolutely
and sorry for slow reply been traveling
no worries were on an extended clock right now
taptap
whassup
making sure the mic was working now
heh indeed it is

messages: hi italy hope youre doing well ill be figuring out the situation north of me for the beginning stages so i hope we can keep pie and lyowestys dmzd if thats ok with you
hope you are around would be good to chat at least briefly
had some technical issues but the trains are running on time now
great what do you think of my proposal

shoot i was running through the messages so fast i forgot about your proposal by the time i responded sounds like you might have enough on your hands without me annoying you in sensitive spaces so im happy to honor such a dmz
thanks lets have a good game

oh gdi now i have to tell a truth that sounds like the most cliched lie in the game my order update didnt take i wasnt intending to go to piedmont yes i know it sounds ridiculous but in this case true

good news is that with your opinion this is more of an opportunity than a disaster id still rather be in tyrolia where im supposed to be i can bounce you in mars to help keep you in burgundy or if you tell me to eff off i can move back up to tyrolia
yes please go off on adventures elsewhere
will do
what plans do you have for boh i can maybe support you into mun if that is likely to succeed
as awesome as that sounds i have an austrian problem to deal with first hopefully diplomatically well see
do you need help i could build a fleet in mar maybe
you probably have other priorities to attend to but if can get in position im happy to do anything that frustrates austria
if you can help a push into munich then thats one less flank for you to worry about
how are you holding up it looks bad initially but austria will need to disband a lot in fall because of turkeys stab not sure how you will come out of it though do you need help in fending off turkey
oh im fine and highly amused i wouldnt mind being the mover into munich though
i dont think im going for munich this turn but you can give it a shot
just as well i didnt see this before the turn processed
i was thinking the same thing
austria dead in one turn impressive
poor guy i was really upset we couldnt come to any sort of agreement or arrangement
so now that turkey is going to have 4 fleets in the mediterranean whats in the future
i doubt theyre just going to sit there and let us be
war my friend war is in our future the faster you can get your fleets into play the better it will go for us
ok ill try to get there
im also moving mar to pie hope thats ok with you
it is what it is we needs do what we must

im sure you expect that im coming to attack you and indeed turkey is trying to set me up against you but the way i look at it is that if we were to split your cp turkey would still win i cant let that happen
now you can retreat to tun and get a cp
what pray tell does cp stand for
oh sorry its a supply center i think mixed lingo there
i figured you meant support center i was just curious which language had the abbreviation as cp
probably some strategy game
im hoping to get to mun this round if you could support ruh into mun that would be appreciated i can support tyr in turn
alternatively pressure r somehow to take away support from mun
we should also come up with a strategy for the mediterranean
i figure t is going to very annoying with that fleet threatening my supply or supporting a push into italy not quite sure yet how to resolve that
good morning
just need to put pressure on r and t and try to outlast the juggernaut at least thats my view

indeed whats your read on the west thus far

i havent heard back from anyone else yet so im assuming its going to develop the normal way me and france fighting in the west while you and russia fight in the east its critical for us to work together so we arent steamrolled by either franceengland or russiaturkey so do you want to agree to an alliance right off the bat

absolutely one of my favorite things about this game is that it can reflect real life history in certain grander strategic considerations one of which is that just as would have been the case neither germany nor austria benefits from an antagonistic relationship

so given the first move i think the two of us are in a relatively strong position turkey seems to be focusing more on russia than you and england and france are fighting are you going to focus more on russia or turkey first i could try and stop russia from taking scandinavia unopposed but id need assurance first that youre going to put pressure on them from the south since a move like warsaw silesia would screw both of us
im feeling pretty solid about working with turkey so russia is the target for now
so it seems like italys turned on us i can support vienna tyrolia next move if you want
im down turkey and i will be able to crack ionian and italy will fall hard

nonaggression doesnt exist in this game in my experience you either have allies who you work with to divide spoils or you have people fighting you or about to

shit

messages: hello france just opening up communication hope we have a good game together
hi germany good to talk to you were you hoping for particular command centers in the low lands im considering going for belgium

based on what ive heard so far i have a suspicion england might try for either holland or belgium im gonna go for a pretty conservative start kiel denmark berlin kiel munich hold do you want to agree that i take holland and you take belgium then see where we go from there
i think thats fine with me
im considering playing fairly aggressive against england and cutting them off at the pass in 1901 your support for that would be very helpful
sure a strong england is always a threat to me so id be happy to help annoy them in the north seascandinavia
ok lets see how things play out and ill be in touch if i need help
its unfortunate you decided to move this way because now it gets more difficult to stop england
i agree theres a good chance england can take belgium this fall but im also still confident in my position im sorry about your position thats mostly bad luck
you had assured me munich would hold but then i find out it moves to bur instead
it wouldnt have changed the final position anyway since you supported with marseille
i wouldve liked to work together and at least take out england quickly
but i see you have other plans

so given the moves of england this fall it seems clear that theyre attacking both of us i know ive been aggressive to you in the past and i know that chances are you wont believe me or agree to work with me but if you hear me out we both can gain from this and utterly destroy england in the process ill retreat from burgundy this spring and ill agree to not invade any more territories of yours until all of england is destroyed im assuming youre going to build a fleet in brest and if you do so and move bre eng in the spring it would cut any support that fleet could provide and i can kick england out of the north sea from there i can help support you in to the english channel or we could work to convoy an army into the british isles in the next few years i hope you consider
i am considering it england in the channel was not great

messages: hey france hows it going looking forward to a fun game
hi russia hope we can keep each other informed of relevant information say on germany and england if convenient
im super down
looks like something went wrong for fall

i work in politics so you can imagine its been a crazy week hahaha
you mean the vote counting thing yeah that seems to have blown up
yeah nuts haha
well see what happens
alright so im kind of tangled with germany england is my temporary friend i think they also want to hit germany
i think england may have seen stp as a move of opportunity im not sure since if they had moved to swe it wouldve been a lot better honestly
i can work with you guys
i think its clear that its just a matter of time before you overrun englands position would you mind divvying up the remains
hey france appreciate you not hitting me last year i could be down for something like that
whats your relationship like with england until last turn i was under the impression you guys were allies
we wereare yeah but englands position is not tenable e made some mistakes when we were mopping up g and it just took too long
makes sense aside from me and turkey youre clearly the strongest and it works for me to work with you so i can just focus on england
what are you thinking in terms of this season
i wish my fleets were available
ugh same
im thinking of siding with e for another season and then going for a stab in holland in fall
yeah that makes sense
id have to look at it again in the morning but i might be down to help you out
clearly turkey and i are allies so im not tryna step on any toes
fair enough
id be very interested in what moves england is planning on making
ill see if i can put a fleet in mao to go for lvp while you take the east side
yeah that would be legit
im down to support you into holland
fighting you over it would be a pain for both of us
could you get me intel on englands next moves
im reaching out but well see if theyre still tuned in to the game
gotcha wouldnt be shocked if they check out
this study is so much fun
like getting paid to play this game what can beat that
that is awesome yeah though i wish i could play diplomacy in a short burst
turkey seems to be taking things very seriously
yeah i feel like hes hardcore
maybe we can look at him after we build up strength by taking out england

at the same time ive never seen such an eagerness to cooperate either
im guessing turkey imposed dmzs on viebud etc
its not overly formal
mostly we had a common interest in taking out austria
and i skipped a turn early on and needed an ally to survive
ah yes i remember that
the sev disband probably helped with the mutual trust
absolutely
so do you want support into hol this turn or wait til fall
whats good france
if i remember correctly we were just starting to work together against england lol
yeah ill move out to lvp now and see if we can push through the fleets
awesome if you build a fleet you can help me take the north sea once we break englands baby were chilling
cool im moving into eng any particular plans from there
we can talk about how to divid it up we definitely should make sure we both get builds were good to pause aggression on our front on the continent
sounds good
do you have a will to team up on turkey at this point i cant stop t by myself
maybe i dont know if we could take him at this point
realignments are always possible

clearly turkey stabbed me if its not too late i want to take you up on your offer to work together
let me know what youre thinking im super on board to work together
hello
hey sorry was busy playing civ with some friends
lol nice
how are you holding up with the craziness
yeah its a time sink
im fine just gotta keep social contacts going even though theyre virtual

but the board state is giving me a headache
join the club

against turkey

yup
i could chase after mao or go for lon what do you think

among diplomacy players never
hey are you doing anything with russia ive tried reaching out to them and they havent responded back to me so im assuming theyre plotting something
well they definitely are plotting lots of things i covered myself with arm but them taking bla will require some guesswork on my part hopefully i can convince them to just take rum with the fleet

alright them not responding to me and pushing north makes me think they dont really have any desire to work with me just figured id talk to you to see if we could coordinate so russia isnt able to easily push both fronts
how did they push north 3 units went south the only northern move they did is stpgob

from what i can tell russia was worried that austria and i were ganging up on them at least thats what austria tells me and the excuse russia gave for both wargal and sevbla so im game to try and out guess them with you but i think russia is looking for an ally anywhere if you offered an alliance with them real or fake they would probably take it for example if you offered to convoy to den while they drop into bal theyd probably do that setting off an rg war not sure if you want that but you could
seems like you and germany are already teaming up on france so you can probably keep russia contained in the north without too much effort right
im not teaming on france also i assumed russia was going to go for norway so im a bit confused with their plan as they havent talked to me other than saying hello
stpsc cant move to nwy its on the wrong coast as a fleet
i mean when they were in stp and then they didnt try to go got swe at all

stp doesnt touch sweden the northern russian fleet can never bother england in the first few years of the game its moves are almost always stpsc gob then gobswe the only time england ever has to worry about russia in 1901 is if they send a mosstp because that unit can threaten nwy
maybe were misunderstanding each other
yeah i think we are i was talking about over multiple turns its just weird how russia isnt making any moves for depots in the north and seems to be letting germany just have at it
russia didnt move because they lost track of time it wasnt intentional im sure i havent heard from them since the spring moves
okay i wasnt sure if had been some mind gaming or what happened
no they totally screwed their position by not moving look in the south
yeah thats why i wasnt sure if they were just playing really passive to try some trick but its pretty obvious now looking at it
so it looks like while you worked something out with russia to carve germany up youre now reorienting against them you want to coordinate anything with me or am i the enemy
im completely fine coordinating what are you thinking

well both of us have only two main competitors left france and russia if we each take on one while the other goes after the other well kinda split the board up but itll be slow if we pick the same enemy itll go faster but well have to leave ourselves a little undefended in the opposite side i go after russia most likely france grows big in the med you go after france russia is breathing down your neck thats my main concern how do i go after russia if i know france will quickly be taking control of italy can we somehow keep france tied down so were free to mostly focus on russia

wow did france actually stab you in this position doesnt he know you can throw your remaining strength into making sure he dies to spite the stab maybe she thinks there is not enough time in the game for me and russia to eliminate him
is france spinning you some tale about how they took holland to build fleets to hold me back
no they havent responded
ive been backstabbred so i shall in turn backstabbr

i can ask russia if they will lay off off you for a couple of seasons so you can throw your units against france im sure hell attack you eventually but i could probably get you a two season head start
yeah i get the feeling im not going to survive much longer anyway but it would be nice to get back at france for their betrayal
im attacking france with all my strength if you send nthech youll block breech and if you also do nwgnao and edinwg you can maybe take france down with you
please please please build an army at home to defend for a few more seasons im attacking france and will help you exact your revenge on them just dont give all your centers to russia

if i can get into spain i will support you to hold in portugal until the end of 1910 so that if we do it right france gets eliminated for stabbing you and you survive with that center plus whatever you can hold in britain which i cant help either way with
that was my plan if i can take our france ill die in peace
ill of course be glad to help enact the killing france part of that plan
so russia is deciding to kill you to save his ass can you bring loneng to help me crush them both
wallon to watch your back at the same time
thats was my thoughts
france will probably crush portugal if i dont help now and you perhaps getting to convoy walbre is my only chance at cracking mar or spa

but as it turns out that would be fine with me in this case
in my neck of the woods we call it carebear play

nothing yet
could be talking to a a lot or just afk for now

unless everyone is screwing with me already which would be typical
i considered it
yeah itd be much more fun for all of yall to say oh yeah jeez italy just blabbers on and on oh you havent heard from them how strange
its fun but i want you to do well so no incentive for me to lie to you
rockin then lemme know when you do hear from them and itll let me know whether that happened before or after they talked to me
and ill give you the same info natch
sure would be nice for me to know if they are back
nice defense over there its a fun start for france when you see moves to eng bur and mar but even more fun when they are parried off
you have some not fun guessing games for the fall though i wish you luck in that
did russia stab you in bla whats your feeling for alliances
looks like italy and a are friends maybe
russia told me they wouldnt go i told them i wouldnt go but said id cover my ass looks like i told they truth and they didnt but its not irreparable at present
ia are friendlyish the romven means austria will be covering tri in fall
clearly egi coordinated spring
i am ok with austria ive actually done everything i said to everyone id do fat lot of good thatll do me
i believe what youre saying but im hoping they will see their initial alliances are no longer in their best interest
its hard to convince people though
if i go with a against r it wouldnt help you unfortunately a shows no interest in antiitalian early moves which is sensible if not ideal for you
thats fine i just kinda need to know how eveyone aligns with g
because it looks like an amazing game for them from spring
im trying to convince england that it would be super fun to coordinate the convoyden gobbal move
but i dont get the impression theyre that creative
gob you mean let g get swe while convoying into den

maybe you should play hardball with italy lay off me and if youre my only neighbor who didnt attack me and i go down ill give you my dots to spite them attack me with them and youll get mar and nothing more ever ill make sure of it
yes thats what i mean
i love risky plays like that once got sev in 1901 that was fun
hah nice
tbf italy has a great position to attack austria
oh i love the pietrl ventri build a ven combo its great if you can get those all to work in fall
just need some help from russia get them to tell austria they feel they really have to go to gal again and theyre happy to bounce but they simply cant risk holding in fall
does a bounce from war help that much
its irrelevant now since italy did attack austria unfortunately for you your position would be much better had italy attempted mar
yeah i had considered it but i had to cover my bases
yep understood
tricky situation eg finally fighting and you lose bur but you really cant function with just one fleet right
but luckily for you germany doesnt seem to understand this game is about negotiation and alliances do you think you can count on england to actually work with you
im not sure but we share a common enemy
you know you could flip sides on the ia axis and get half of the balkans probably right
nor do i want my right flank to succumb to austria
succumb too austria succumb to me six of one half dozen of another no but yes ai war is as fantastic for me as eg war is for you
i dont see what youre gaining from this long term by letting r build back up they seem intent to not anger g so what then austria or you
russia just took sweden from germany with english help
that was a lost cause
i encouraged that alliance helping break the eg you and russia were so keen to have broken up now england and russia are both mildly antigerman

sweden was only a lost cause for germany if they fought with england if theyd known how to be an alliance player theyd have been offering to give centers to england to cement their alliance they didnt do that and got stabbed for it

i dont understand people who play this game like it was gunboat the game is called diplomacy for a reason make friends use those friends to kill everyone off who doesnt have friends try and convince other people to stop being friends with your enemies and eventually kill your friends before they kill you forget the board the dots its about the people
but yes if i want to win i have to stab a knife into someone gotta break some eggs to make an omelette and all that
so from your perspective youre worried about seeing austria get too big is that what im hearing or russia what worries you now that eg is probably not a thing for the time being
i see your assitance with austria but i wouldnt want that to go too far because italys current position is unstable
yeah italy is ready to get pretty wrecked unless austria or i decide to stop working together
so you coming to prop italy up or get a piece for yourself we should talk either way
right im moving into the mediterranean to get a better position for either case
why did you not support kie and cut munich
adjucation happened before i could think things through
bummer i never really get a chance to turn on russia and slow them down if they keep growing so fast i never have an easy chance to stab im doing my best to keep up with them at this point
im happy to cooperate since they will be 3 on your supply now
im not quite sure what they would do by now but stab you or defend against a stab given that they have england in the bag
as long as youre not helping england thats for sure
thats true but i prefer to win
is that really likely on this board
i dont know but id love for us to work together to make sure we both have a shot

tactically on this board england falls to russia and you cant hold back my fleets without two fleet builds but then you cant hold burgundy on land if russia stabs me before i stab them they have a shot at 18 before 1910 i could stab them but i have much a smaller chance at 18 in time there is no way you can get that big unless you eat england alive from behind before they know whats happening
i dont really play with the deadline in mind kind of ruins it for me p
in any case im not just gonna sit here and die a slow death

sure so pick direction which has a possible good outcome there are two powers on the board capable of totally overrunning your position so the only option is to somehow play them against each other by suggesting to one of the two that youd intentionally make the other one win the game for example and be willing to follow through on it or be willing to think outside the box and throw yourself fully at one power or the other in a last ditch attempt to get as big as you can in the time left this is a game of alliances being willing to sacrifice your position for a chance at either winning or dying in the process is the only shot any of us have

would you have time to be able to stab england if you had a build from italy and then we could get russia to support you into hol with two builds you could perhaps quickly get to england and kill them fast enough to hold russia back until i stabbed them in the east and you worked to control the west
i will try to talk to russia and see how it goes i just dont know if i can get a piece of italy without arousing suspicion tunesia

tunis is now undefended and yes if you were to promise youd use the build you got from that center to attack england id be ok with you taking that id focus on the two remaining italian home centers ive got almost surrounded and would also promise to stop hitting marseille soo you could bring your pie army back home to ensure burgundy is still more safe in case russia wont help you and keeps attacking ruh to get to bur
but if russia is willing to work with you then yeah you could get two builds and youd be back in this game as youd be able to get to lvplon before russia could

but if you dont feel comfortable with any of that id understand youve gotta do what you feel safest doing dont even feel like you need to tell me ill do the same either way italy has turtledup pretty good so itll take most of my effort just too crack romnap you can ignore tun or take it your choice
sounds good ill use the tun build to shore up my defenses with a fleet from bre

did you come to an arrangement with russia which ended up feeling safe for you to try this game could get to a 121210 three way draw if you can get into position to get lvp and lon with builds from tun and hol i think there enough seasons before fall 1910 to get there still
we still playing this game
yeah i thought about that
well see what happens with russia
yep i reread my orders and im crushing rome and letting you have tunis to build for the last few game years
ok so where do you need to see my units to give you the breathing room to eliminate england by the end of 1910 so we can have a 3way draw instead of 4way
if we can dmz some area between italy and me then that would free up my fleets

you are in the more precarious position although the game is time limited so the danger isnt quite so great so you make a specific proposal and ill tell you if that is asking too much or is fine as long as you keep your end of the bargain
if you left it up to me i could say ill park my fleets on italian coasts and leave tys empty but keep ion for defense

i normally make very specific proposals so theres no ambiguity if you are keeping two fleets in the med to protect tunis then i can offer to park tunis on the coast and do naptys romtys self bounce and iontun to cut your support so you cant do tun s westys to force tys from me but if you have a different specific suggestion im all ears
so what happens with tys
f tys parks in tus in this proposal as thats the only space available for it that is not occupied

i guess given your lack of response you dont like any of my proposals or have any alternative ideas so ill assume youre not going to focus on getting rid of england thats totally reasonable and within your rights but then that means i have no reason to hold back i guess
i am not attacking you at the moment but i also dont like the proposal
so do you have another one
i can withdraw from pie if you withdraw from tys but not to tus

im not sure how i can make sure you dont attack tys if i pull back without doing a selfbounce in tys and iontun to make sure you dont support an attack on tys if i pull back and you do tun s westys youll get in
if tus makes you uncomfortable you could stay in pie as protection
that isnt much of protection since it would be easy to get through
tbf in the long term you could push through anyway but all i want is some buffer

yeah i get it i guess we could lock down on position a bit tys s iontun iontun wes s tun tun h and that way i am not in tus and tunis is locked down safely as well i wouldnt be pulling out if tys in that case
i think thats fair lets go with that
sounds good ill go set my orders before we run out of time
yeah time limits
sorry about lying about tuslyo i just had nothing left to do with those couldnt just leave my units waiting around doing nothing
so you do realize that both bel and hol can get taken this fall right russia can snap up english centers at their leisure as england isnt bothering to defend anyways

and while you have no reason to trust me holbel would mean you only lose one of those two and since russia has to do munruh too cut ruh s hol so if you counterattacked bur s ruhmun you could possibly take munich
seems like you do care about maintaining at least the status quo
between you and russia that is
i can see another way in which i can not got steamrolled you need to step up and put some pressure on russia
i do realize that yes russia growing too big too fast is super dangerous for me
since you have no reason to trust me watch what i do
and please cover your ass
show me some fireworks
big enough for you
and did i not tell you about holbel
youre welcome p
you did but i wasnt willing to make the first stab
oh thats why i said watch i do i figured you had to see it to believe it
so from here what do you plan to do with lyo

so to be honest tunis isnt something you can safely hold with england still alive and russia on your doorstep so unless you have a better offer ill be using lyo to force access to tunis since i basically loaned it to you in the first place to get builds to attack england
i see well its true that england is about to fall
at least this way you can focus on that direction instead of where its a losing battle
well that was nice of russia to give you munich
its not something i can keep though
eh he has a lot of work on my account now he may not have time to fight over munich

messages: hi austria what are your thoughts on tyr any ideas for opening moves more generally
id like to see tyr remain a dmz as not to provoke any hostilies between myself you or germany thoughts
works for me are you looking to expand into the balkans first would you be interested in italyaustria alliance to take on turkey there

i believe conflict between russia and turkey is inevitable so i plan to wait and see what happens there id appreciate support in the future should it come to it and rest assured that i will endeavour to help you should you be attacked
keeping russia out of rum nice how deep does this alliance with turkey run
were on good terms and it seems to be working out for both of us thus far how are you with germany and france
how would you feel about moving out of greece and taking tunisia instead
whats in it for me
id like to hold it for at least one more season but then will probably move out
what happened to tyr being a dmz and what happened with greece im willing to give you the benefit of the doubt as ive cocked up with convoys many times
turns out drunk orders are bad orders
what are you planning doing this turn
turning on france to the east
not sure i like how powerful youre letting turkey get though
now that the turks have stabbed you in the back would you be willing to support my fleet apulianionian
consider it done
thanks much appreciated hoping to work together more going forward

messages: i messaged you on backstabbr then i realized i dont think im supposed to do that
so basic gist was i think we have a lot of opportunity to work together and common interests if youre open to it
i am inclined to agree how would you like to approach scandinavia

id like denmark norways all yours perhaps we could move on russia but i think we should start with france otherwise hell become a problem for us both after that we can hash out the rest of scandanavia and russia as it goes
alright are we content to let russia take sweden with no contest
if we put up a fight well have to go for russia right away if we did that what would we do about france
thats fair im personally proleave sweden to russia but i wanted to doublecheck with you
what would you like to do against france

alright well leave it for now i was hoping to get you into brest as soon as possible and then me into paris and then decide from there likely you in iberia and me in marseilles but i dont want to count our chickens before theyre hatched
alright sounds good
hey whats the deal with france theyre talking about an alliance between us three to counter russia and italy
he hasnt told me about that an efgs an interesting proposition but idk what do you think and wdu mean whats his deal
how do you want to open up there are a lot of options and opportunities
but he may just have figured we want to move west and tried to throw me off
i ask because he said he already talked to you about it
i think im going to go ec to be aggressive on france and take norway
he also said hes working closely w france
lets be aggressive with france so we can switch back to russia asap
hm yeah russia also told me there were murmurs you wanted to attack me
my only dialogue with russia has been to advocate for the equal sharing of scandinavia ive been told that russia seems to want to commit south
i suspect that france and russia are both worried about two players moving on them early and may be in an alliance to stretch us out

if russia does want to commit south it is logical that theyd try to prevent a united northern threat considering that rusfr may be coordinating i am going to play cautiously and refrain from committing east or west
russia admitted to me that hes in an alliance with france
he intends to move on you it seems so i dont think hes truly committing south maybe just maintaining a hold either way time will tell
you told me you were looking to move aggressively against france if we can get russia distracted by turkey especially with austrian help ik the south their alliance wont matter
i was gonna play aggressive but im going to slow down to protect my expansion i dont want to deprive myself of builds because i spread myself too thin
im gonna to move to secure norway and maybe place myself to support you in benelux or move against france next turn
if frs fleet moves to secure spain ill go in

alright sounds fine with me just let me know of your intentions going forward so i dont end up acting alone seems like russia is focused on the south which is excellent news for a move on france if we could just get austria involved hes playing awfully passive
what happened with the liverpool to london misorder last turn
regarding france are you trying to take belgium i would prefer to have it because otherwise you can get 3 builds and myself only 1
it works on the website i normally play
im not sure i was under the impression i could move an army into a space that was becoming vacant
oh i realize now that im a fool and it doesnt border i wasnt paying attention putting down the move
lol yeah they dont border

and i hate to be so greedy to open up but im nervous that if i forego a build it opens me up to have russia france or both collapse on me and then were really fucked particularly if france walks into munich ill need both builds badly
im more than willing to cede territory to you going forward when im better in a position to subdue france or russia depending on what weve decided does that sound alright
its really funny that you mention france and munich
it just so happens that ive been talking to france and theyre under the impression that ill bounce you out of denmark if they march into munich
ah so he is moving into munich while id rather have that scenario not happen
he may very well test my loyalty and let me try to bounce out of denmark first but he offered to march to munich if i bounced you
btw have you talked to italy
my last message doesnt look to have sent correctly so ill repeat
have you talked to italy they might be helpful soon
anywho im gonna try to tie up the french fleet and take norway we can talk about territory later
well how would you like to work this one out
and he hadnt responded in a while just messaged him again
alright so how are you looking to move and are you fine letting me have the three builds
im going nor and ec you can have your 3 builds rn but ill be expecting land later since youre getting two builds on me
also if france asks you about an alliance we definitely had a convo about a loose 3 way alliance
alright excellent sounds good well even it out promise that i just want a healthy border around my home centers and a guarantee i can push back france
oh ok so you and i had a convo about a loose efg
yeah just in case france tries to check
right makes sense
but he attacked me so im moving in
alright that sounds good do you want me to move into brest
also what should i go about building
go for it although hell probably build a fleet there
oh sorry missed this
you built a fleet in edinburgh why id think youd want it in london no

yeah i was thinking london for a long time but i reached the conclusion that i would feel better with a fleet that could serve as a sort of home fleet and i figured london served as a better base for attacks
im not sure yet if its a good plan but i figured no harming in trying it out
i suppose so but russia isnt gonna be able to come your way and were supposed to be attack france rn so

alright can we renegotiate im not sure what france said to sway you was it the three initial builds cuz you can have belgium id just really prefer to knock out france belgium brest and portugal can be yours all i want is paris and italy can take marseilles and spain really we can really negotiate however id just rather not be at odds w you now id figure youd much rather ally w me seeing as france has struck a deal w every nation ive talked to so far which makes him not that trustworthy and he has three fleets that can easily slip in your back door to my one that you have pinned on land so if you head my way hes gonna walk in your back door i would bet you money what do you say can we strike some sort of deal
le me know your thoughts
im sorry mate frances fleets are too big for me to piss him off i wont push past denmark and if you can negotiate peace with him ill respect it
alright understood
i mean honestly mate hes gonna attack you either way and the two of us can stop him im not sure why youd back off like that i dont mean to be rude but how much experience do you have with this game

im saying honestly both cuz its by far the most logical thing to do and hes in great position to do it now that hes advanced and youve completely backed off and cuz its literally what he told me he was going to do
what makes you say we can push him back if he has deals with everyone

if you surrender denmark to me i will help you survive frances push i am not going to involve myself in this war for either side without immediately tangible benefits france is a difficult invasion for me and ive spent a lot of time in the north sea with no new land

he doesnt have actual deals not ones people are intending to follow through on cuz they dont trust him cuz he makes deals w everyone russia doesnt trust him and is way too busy w austria and turkey italy doesnt trust him either and i convinced him to invade the south although hes kind of a mess at the moment i actually dont know if turkey or austria has any sort of deal with france and who is actually free to intervene against us

im not sure how you can make tangible benefits if you dont involve yourself though honestly and if you help me out well topple france and how can i come attack you honestly france is headed for you as we speak and is trying to sue for peace with me so that he can complete his invasion of you not to mention he has three fleets you just turned your back on please listen to reason here either way id much rather you take belgium can we make that deal
sorry about the delay im willing to exchange belgium for cooperation against france
alright sounds good
how should i move i dont know how to handle his fleets
well moving out of the channel seriously set you back
but we can fix this
if you move to the north atlantic english channel and north sea and your army to wales you can cover your back side and set up a convoy route into france
hows that sound
i am not gonna go nor atl bcause i want a fleet in nor but the rest sounds good france wants to move into picardy this turn
also given how weird the western triangle has been can i ask what youre going to do with your fleet turning to face france leaves me vulnerable in that regard
oh i honestly dont know yet
but i start the game w it and built two armies so im not exactly looking for naval dominance

messages: hello russia i hope we can both agree that peace between our nations would be beneficial for the both of us id like to suggest that in return for letting me into romania you will have my support should you wish to expand into scandinavia

hi austria i can definitely agree that peace between our nations would be good for both of us unfortunetly i cant agree to letting you have rumania as that is basically the back door into russia if you do try to take it then there is going to have to be war between our two great countries also i dont see how you could really support me into scandinavia but that besides i think we would both benifit from an alliance against turkey what do you think about that

in that case i will keep out of romania if you do the same well keep it as a dmz ill admit my promise to help you with scandinavia was a little optimistic but do excuse me as ill blame it on a tad too much austrian beer we should keep an eye on turkey but i feel as though an alliance this early on will not leave us in the best of standing with the rest of europe

if were going to have an alliance we should aim for blitzing turkey its the power triangle austriaturkeyrussia only one of them is going to survive very long also what is your relationship with italy looking like just a note i am willing to work out an agreement of who gets what part of the balkans but i am taking romania it is essentially part of russia and leaving it as a dmz just will not do if turkey goes for the black sea
i will give you romania as long as we can take out turkey asap should we start this turn
ofc we should start this turn
ill push down to serbia and continue to push from the south
ok can you trust italy how is your relationship with them
i have not yet spoken in any great detail with italy and am waiting to hear back from them
alliance against turkey is still on right
of course i heard back from italy as well and we seem to be on the same wavelength
why did you only move 2 units also turkey told me that u told him that i was going to attack you what was that about
dont believe turkey i said nothing of the sort i imagine hes just trying to cause an upset between us
that was mean
oh well
awfully sorry old chap but alls fair in love and war

i know you and turkey probably have a nice and cozy alliance right now but despite your betrayal i still think we could have a very powerful alliance that would be able to crush turkey within a year or two if we got italy involved im sure we could figure something out where for example you support me into rum and italy supports you into bul
hi austria turkey told me youre alliance is over is that true
it looks like youre alliance has ended and before long one of us in the east will be elliminated i say we work together to make that someone be turkey
what do you think

they told me they are interested in working with me against you and are going to try to take ser so what i think we should do is you attack rum with bud and gal which would cut support and let me take sev that way we get two of turkeys territories which would be a big blow to them
do you have any proof to these claims
at the same time however it does seem plausible that turkey will move on serbia
ill do it
no proof unless i took a screenshot ig but i feel that goes against the spirit of the game
good luck
no i wouldnt expect you to take a screenshot its alright
ok
if you can do moscow s sevastopol h and galicia s ukrainerumania this turn then we can most likely take romania
yeah france told me about the orders you sent me
thoughts
i like them are you on board
aye
if this alliance works outand i hope it does we will have turkey dead pretty soon
i stabbed you in the back once already i owe you this one
thx
although technically youre the one getting rum
ive been short changed by turkey i need it at least for now once we start pushing him back you can take some of his cores
what are you plans for after turkey
not sure yet italy maybe what about you
if i get a build in the fall i can build a fleet in sev to further our attack on turkey what are you planning for moves
do you think that maybe we should turn our attention to france theyll be running away with it before long
yes we probably should
hey any plans for this turn
ig ur prob going for bul correct do you mind if i have rum i would support you into bul from there if u didt get it this turn
or support u somewhere else if u did

hey im assuming our alliance is over i wanted to keep it going but didnt get anything from you if you want to i think furthering our alliance would still work and i could help you fight france and also give u rum backin exchange for helping me w turkey
sorry ive been swamped with work recently france is our biggest threat at the moment and i think turkey believes the same
ok so what do you want to do

i figure theres not much we can do to stop him from pushing in the north unless youre able to stop him from getting those scs yourself im pretty tied up in the south and reckon ill be out soon enough we just need to try and stop him slowly eating his way up to 18

hey austria long time no see sorry for the stab earlier i think we should try to work together to stop france from winning if we work together we can stop france from getting 3 more centers and then we will all win in a 3 4 or 5 way draw when the game is hardcapped at 1910
i know you probably dont want to work with me but if you want for it to be a win including you then we should definitly work together
vie bud or ser moves to tri w the other two supporting
can bud and ser support me into tri and i will give u ven next turn i think that would be best since support cant be cut
austria
i really need an answer
apologies for no response i am in a different time zone

messages: hey austria hows it going i am hoping we can work together on this one no point getting into any early conflict which will only serve to help everyone else how do you like to split up the balkans
hi turkey i fully agree that we should stay peaceful with eachother how do you like the sound of you getting greece and bulgaria and ill go for romania and serbia
that sounds good if we stick together we can get through this early game intact whats your read on russia and italy have you heard from them
havent heard from either of them yet unfortunately
ah well our biggest issue is keeping russia out of rumania i will see if they have plans to move most units south it sounds like they might be

russia is planning to take you out as soon as possible and is asking me to help how do you feel about moving against russia as i believe that he will be the biggest threat to the two of us he is really posturing in his communications with me

sure that makes sense like i said first thing would be to keep russia out of rum whether that be by supporting yours or my army in italy is pretty quiet but what i did hear from him was fairly anti austrian by the way i believe they are probably pretty tight with russia them being natural allies anyway

well im getting the same sort of stuff from russia that you have they are indicating to me that they will commit south and want to attack you directly with my help i have told them id consider it but know that i am firmly locked in to working together with you looks like our neighbours have made the decision for us really which makes it easy right
im quite happy to support you going into romania as i can imagine that ill need my forces to fend off italy will you be moving up to bulgaria this turn and go onto romania from there
ok yes lets do that and i can support you into greece the following year if you dont get it this year

just confirming that you will support my bul army into rum this season looks like russia is firmly committed south but germany is gifting them sweden and england looks like they wont put up any resistance either so we better not let them take rum as well or theyll be running rampant in no time
i can confirm that i will definitely be supporting you into romania russia has been trying to sow doubt between us by telling me that you told him that i plan to attack him
nicely done i reckon weve got russia on the backfoot now

yes nice one im glad we could sort things out next is to get you into greece then well have secured our front and can go from there russia does have three on rum but we can fend that off together and warsaw for you and moscow for me can be the midterm goal what do you think
sounds like a plan ill support rum this turn and move down into greece
ah i didnt see that italy was in greece would have been wise to check the map before sending messages
haha yeah well we can knock him out of there if you like either in the spring or fall he cant stop it since he built that fleet in rom
what do you want me to do in regards to russia

we can support your bud army into gal i think that would be best so i support you into gal and support ser army into greece if it works out for spring i mught be able to get a convoy in in fall but thats probably a next year thing
yeah okay that works
hmm we might need to change our plans i think russia is planning to go to sil anyway still on for greece though what are you going to do about tri can you trust italy not to go for it
yeah i think best to support you into greece in the fall just need to hold in rum this season if you can still support me in rum that would be appreciated
roger that
im not sure if going for greece this turn is entirely preferable as italy said they plan to move out and it might be better not to provoke them quite yet
ok good call
well looks like italy messed it up anyway thanks for the support looks like i did need it after all what do you want to do this season
now italy has moved into tyr which we agreed was a dmz so if you could support ser in greece thatd be much appreciated what do you want to do vis a vis russia

no problem i will support you into greece if you can attack gal to cut the support there and support me in rum that would be great all going well we get one each do you think italy will be getting out of greece though anyway
actually dont worry about supporting in rum just the hit on gal should do it
just confirming that you still need my support into greece and can still hit gal for me
yes for both
italy claims to be moving out of greece i might need to pull the support im being told that you and russia might be attacking me instead

meh ill trust you over them ill keep the support locked in if you and russia wanted to take rum you could do it then we would be bogged down for the foreseeable future and that would just help the west we have the jump on the west at this point so ill hope youre still on board for that reason
russia and i havent been in contact since i first betrayed him may i ask who told you this
italy was suggesting it more than saying it but they got me a bit paranoid anyway
now theres something italy was suggesting that he and i go against you
yeah im not surprised he was also offering me support into serbia we can stick to our guns here and easily take russia and italy ive got the paranoia in check now
aye russia was also asking me to turn on you but weve got a good thing going here

russia has asked me to work with him and italy dont know for sure that they are in cahoots yet and suggested that he support me into romania and italy into bulgaria this is of course not possible now that italy had retreated from greece i was wondering perhaps if i should string russia along so that we may know his moves
you could definitely do that if you like we will know more once we see where russia builds
i suspect italy and russia would be working together at least at some level they are obvious allies we have the jump on both of them now though

so i was thinking i would push into ukr this year and then mos depending on how things go i can support you into war and go for mos next year if you can support my rum army to ukr and russia covers war then the ukr army will have to disband also you can perhaps take the adr if you get it we can get ion in the fall what do you think
done and done supporting rum ukr disrupting boh and hopefully taking adr
what do you want to do for this one we should probably repeat our fleet moves this time we would get one or the other
if you can disrupt ukr ill stop boh and see if germany could hit sil and then ill move gal into war which will deprive russia of a build
ok have locked that in
might need to shift tack a little bit would love to break through into russia but maybe we need to make ground into italy first
aye we seem to be in a bit of a stalemate at the moment

ill come in to the adr so dont go there with your fleet also i will support your army in gal to ukr that might get us somewhere but i guess we will have a new army in war to worry about will check again after the builds
it wont be worth it you just get to be the second target for russia and italy if you want to turn it around let me know
although since germany has given gifts to everyone and england has essentially stopped playing this game has deteriorated into pointless territory
it has gotten rather back and forth
well youve given up your best ally for well nothing are you going to follow through as russias puppet
honestly at this point i dont even know fancied a little shake up as the game was getting a bit stale

yeah i get that if you can convince russia to worry about the main threat france call a truce and you and i can both try and hold france back if not i will obviously just help france take it out for the price of my survival i dont really mind either way
will see what russia has to say

russia should be moving to boh and sil you and i should get into ion and tys knock italy out because why not however if russia doesnt move his armies west to boh and sil or he moves mos to ukr it will be pretty obvious that hes just going to take you out
i do reckon hell try to come after me after i betrayed him at the start
if you want i can support you into sev up to you
and now theres support for you into rum if you want it
aye from serbia if you could
done
reckon you could disrupt romiana
yup done
ta

messages: hey austria
i wanted to ask if you knew about italian intentions i dont think he plans to move to piedmont which could be an indication that you want to play defensively
i have not yet heard anything from italy unfortunately
what are your thoughts in terms of your moves
just looking to secure my borders at the moment you
yeah im looking to secure my borders as well
what are you thinking now
in terms of working with italyrussiaturkey
naturally i dont want to give too much away but i reckon youll be able to tell soon enough
very interesting moves
youve done well getting 3 builds this season may i ask if you have made any alliances
i have no chance of keeping munich and england is in the channel so its honestly a less than ideal situation
i was planning to work with germany but it seems like they plan to attack me now that i took munich
ah yes that its unfortunate
so what exactly is going on in your region it looked like you and turkey were buddies but those turkish builds arent that ideal for you i think
i am very worried about a steamrollerrussia turkey alliance
i must admit that i am worried that russia and turkey are in cahoots and russia let us take romania so that id trust turkey for them to then turn on me and push west

i think its the most likely explanation for a warsaw if russia was worried about turkey wouldnt they build a moscow likewise if turkey intended to take sevastopol wouldnt a smyrna make more sense to capture armenia and then sev

i think its the most likely explanation for a warsaw if russia was worried about turkey wouldnt they build a moscow likewise if turkey intended to take sevastopol wouldnt a smyrna make more sense to capture armenia and then sev
by the way i was wondering for the longest time about you and italys moves i wont tell anyone but is the plan to convoy venice to tunis
thats freaking awesome if so
not sure if it is the best plan if russia and turkey are working together the army could be needed more in albania
by the way any suggestions for me in the north ive been hearing different things from germany and england so im at a bit of a crossroads in terms of who to trust and what to do
well i found an ally since i think russia will move to silesia to pull some german units away from munich
i havent heard from england or germany on why they plan to do unfortunately
no worries hopefully you have things figured out with your neighbors i think turkey is sowing a lot of discord between russia you and italy to his own advantage
aye he is most likely up to something
you need a build this turn
whatever you do dont let turkey take greece and sevastopol
any updates on your plans regarding turkey
i will tell you this in the first year russia told me he was working with you against turkey somehow when the orders were read turkey had convinced both you and russia to work with him
so it seems like turkey has been playing both sides from the start

im not trying to be super nosy and i apologize in advance if i am coming off that way but for my long term interests it is pretty important that turkey doesnt start explosively growing and wiping out half of the map any chance you and russia can figure things out to recapture rumania from turkey
russia wont work with me on this unfortunately
thats too bad is it like he is not responding to you or he flat out refused
because it is possible that he has been mia for the past few days
any intel on england or germany
england is worried about being caught in the middle of you and germany and germany is just happy that weve tied up russia
cool makes sense it has been very quiet lately which is concerning me greatly
i think thats just because its the weekend i imagine itll pick back up once orders start going through
russia was not responding due to the weekend and he said he would be extremely enthusiastic to work with you
looks like you are in good shape id watch out in case turkey intends to stab you for 2 serbia and greece
so what are your thoughts on this game right now
are you attacking italy
i love to see you working with russia against turkey im assuming a retreat to ukraine with the idea of taking rumania
by the way what is your plan with the adriatic sea will you be fighting italy
that was mainly to stop turkey getting a foothold there
it might work in our favor actually if the plan is to dislodge turkey from the ionian we have a total of 4 fleets to his 3
looks like ukrainerumania moscow s sevastopol h budapest s serbia h serbia s ukrainerumania galicia s ukrainerumania will guarantee you rumania
what is your relationship with italy like i thought you two were fighting by bouncing in the adriatic so much
im happy to help the cause and ive told italy my moves each turn but i still feel like i dont know what the plan is here is there even a plan
thoughts on moves
this game is going very well for you you have zero threats and allies all around you you are highly likely to take bulgaria andor greece this year

we should talk about borders if you can move your fleet from the adriatic to albania it would help you capture greece and id have no problems staying out of tyrolia and trieste if you are willing to do the same
thoughts
not sure why italy disbanded ionian but i figure he may have missed the deadline for builds
we need to move quickly if we still want to get the edge on turkey
also any thoughts on russia
im fine with keeping out of tyr and tri to maintain a dmz between us im not 100 sure about russia at the moment i feel as though as soon as turkey is gone he will move against me
sounds good i agree i would definitely not leave yourself open to being stabbedd by russia if possible
it looks like you are aiming to take venice meanwhile turkey has a walk into tunis and will only get stronger maybe we should try to cooperate instead of fight
what gives with the move to trieste
ngl completely forgot about it being a dmz im not attacking you dw
ok i can trust that since i think taking the ionian andor albania is a priority for you
damn i seriously did not intend to take trieste i had figured i would want to stay in venice for the time being with you bordering it with two units and didnt think i would actually end up there
if there is absolutely anything i can do to help you with my army in trieste its your unit to order
i guess just pull back to venice

sure especially if italy keeps piedmont that might be the move i am also happy to help support budapest to hold so that you dont lose it to russia speaking of which i am assuming you are disbanding the adriatic sea it doesnt seem to be very useful since turkey will be able to keep it out of the ionian anyway
any more thoughts now that builds have been put down
if you can support a hold in budapest could i take venice for the time being im getting rather weak as it goes
i feel like you should have kept albania instead of adriatic putting the fleet in venice only moves us backwards
i cant stop you from moving to venice though i do feel like you are better off putting it on the front lines
disbanding albania was a mistake ill admit
i was assuming a move like that meant you might be working with turkey again which would probably be a huge help for you
darn we werent on the same page last turn but im super glad to see you work with turkey again
russia is in a really good position to wipe you off the map so i would definitely try to slow him down ill do what i can in the north
just as a sidenote i noticed you held in budapest but it could have potentially supported serbia to rumania
sorry the bot was down for a short bit if you support budapest to hold with serbia and turkey cuts rumania youll keep budapest otherwise you probably will lose it to russia
congrats on keeping budapest
we can definitely keep pushing back russia
turkey and russia both told me that they want to eliminate you and england and go for a 3 way draw

im not sure im very interested in that because we only just started making progress against russia and russiaturkey alliance is always scary and may be able to overpower me in the long run they dont want to give me any of the builds
would you be willing to support tunis to the ionian sea in the spring also i can give you trieste in the fall in exchange for vienna if thats alright with you
oh crap you have a disband
not sure what the best disband is probably either budapest or adriatic
i think budapestrumania serbia s budapestrumania gives you the highest chances of surviving from russiaturkey onslaught this turn
and actually serbiaalbania would ensure turkey cannot outflank us
darn if you had moved budapest to rumania you would have kept serbia gg
wait wait wait you can retreat serbia to greece
if you retreat to greece ill support you back into serbia

alright that works for me
is nwg to edi good enough for you

stuff like the bounce in english channel
but what if i move out of norway and let you get it back could that save our alliance

messages: id love to work with you this game not sure what your thoughts are but in my opinion russia and france are the two countries who are the most natural allies on the board

hi france i completely agree with you russia and france really are great allies for now we might not have to much to do with eachother but i would love to have an alliance with you how is it looking in the north are you thinking of teaming up with england or germany i would recommend england as an ally as i have heard rumours of germany trying to takey you out looking forwards to a great game russia
sounds great i took your advice and am working things out with england hopefully we can keep things balanced between them and meet up somewhere in the middle
them being england and germany
any thoughts on your south a russiaturkey alliance could work well since i think that austria and italy may be fighting early on
hmm do you know any more info about that
unfortunately not turkey has been unwilling to share their plans
hmm are you still allied with england they did a pretty anti russian move there
i think englands moves might actually lean more pro russia given that the army move failed and england will have to put a fleet in norway an army in norway would be a lot more antirussian for sure
that being said i am trying to see if england would be interested in making some antigerman moves which can help get england off of your back
whats the scoop regarding turkeyaustria looks like everyone made relatively conservative openings
im with austria going for turkey
umm well thats not good
why is that
obviously not anymore though
it looks like austria helped turkey against you and turkey stabbed you
i was actually allies with them both and was going to stab austria but ig not
yeah
i wonder if attacking turkey with austria is still on the table given italys position to help with bulgaria andor rumania italy has a highly vested interest in seeing you do well too
have you and england talked at all about taking denmark from germany
turkeys builds are looking pretty good for you
hopefully you both made up
im not sure if me and turkey are allies anymore if you want you could clear the order with turkey and move munich into tyr where you could help take austria out
sure if i have a retreat i definitely plan to move there
by the way ive been spreading misinformation by saying that you will move to silesia just thought id give you a heads up

darn it looks like turkey is really committed to attacking you which is too bad is austria willing to work with you this might be the best chance you both have of taking rumania so ive strongly suggested to austria that they support galicia to rumania i figure that cutting rumania support is the best chance you have of keeping sev though turkey has it guaranteed if they simply cut ukraine support
by the way what are your thoughts regarding what you plan to do with sweden
are you willing to work with austria
you there still
do you have information on german or english plans some intel would really help at this point

hi france i just got back from a long weekend but now i will always be here england wants me to attack germany in denmark and said that you had requested that is that true no idea about germany as they are not responing
italy seems like they are messing up a lot they had 3 invalid orders so i dont know how strong of an ally they might be
what about you got any intel

i would love to work together with austria as i think it would be a very powerful alliance but i fear i cant stop turkey and austria from continuing to attack me also im a little worried about england
hmm i was under the impression that england would attack denmark and that he wanted you to support him into denmark
yes but did you request that
sorry mistyped above i meant england moving into denmark
well i assumed england would do it anyway because it should be a guaranteed supply center england and i have been talking a lot

i think if you move to norway youll be better off i didnt ask england to get you to support him i dont think but i did ask england to move to denmark otherwise id worry what else those fleets are up to

yes me and england are on pretty good terms as well but i really hope they dont attack me what do you think the likelihood of that is i think later in the game an alliance between me you and england could be insanly powerful
my hope is that england supports himself into denmark
true
true
hmm its honestly really tough to read england i dont think they are going after you but they did mention taking sweden earlier int he game so i might request a bounce in norway or something like that
so you think i should move to nwy and do you think i should arrange a bounce or use it to stab i dont really want to attack england
hmm if you dont really want to attack england i would arrange a bounce probably i dont know what norwegian sea is up to but it is probably best if it stays there
there isnt a ton of time before the deadline so im not sure if england is online or not
i told england to move from nwg to edinburgh and they agreed in return for me support a move to denmark
how close are you with england
sweet that works fine as long as england follows through
also rn i dont have any things i need w warsaw anywhere you would like me to move it
i feel like if everything works out our alliance could last a long time and has potential to become very powerful
i dont actually think im that close to england right now but we talk a lot hes said he will help me against germany and i am somewhat skeptical of whether he will follow through or not
i dont thing germany has many friends
if i move to silesia with war i could help you w germany
id love to see that honestly
alright hopefully in return for support i could have berlin and you would get the rest of germany
especially if the three of us work things out you could drop down to the baltic sea and wed be able to split germany very quickly
that sounds good to me
right but things might not work out that great if i move into nwy
haha
im kinda worried about attacking england since that would mean england austria and turkey all going after me and i dont think i can handle that
yeah
i need to go but ill be back in 10 min if you wana keep talking
sounds good
heres a thought if were taking down germany it would make sense for you to support england to denmark
and then england moves north sea to helgoland norwegian sea to north sea and skaggerak to denmark
unfortunately it seems that england is not online
do you know which unit england wanted to move to denmark with
yea i dont want to attack england i think i will support instead
perfect i agree with your decision after a brief convo with england im a lot less concerned about things because enow the stories are all matching up
soo you did just talk to england correct cuz i just messaged them and they are for sure online
yep i did talk to them i think they were having connection issues earlier which is why i thought they were offline
they say they are bouncing north sea in ec
checks out we organized a bounce rhere
wait by ec do you mean the english channel
yep

sorry about me moving into norway i was pretty worried they would attack me and some things didnt match up also i really needed the build now i feel bad cuz they were completely honest hopefully england will accept my apology and we can continue our alliance
honestly the build was worth it i think asutria and turkey are seriously strong together and stopping them will be a lot harder than i first thought
yes thx for understanding

turkey is crazy they try to make a deal with me and they betray every time austria wont respond to my messages and basically nobody can help me over there so hopefully i will be able to hold them off and get some extra builds from germany
i wish italy was a better player then they could help
anyways i need to go to bed now but talk in the morning
omfg turkey is ridiculous
they just said i did not have enough time to change my orders alliance still on
imma play gullible and just go with it
god
sorry for the all the messages
yeah they are def lying lol
building warsaw and moscow im assuming
oh crap you retreated to bohemia
as much as i love to see you in bohemia i worry you wont be able todefend your homeland effectively
do you have relations with either rturkey or austria
whats the deal with norway

england says the alliance might work if i move out of nwy which i probably will since i cant have another enemy turkey thinks i am very gullible and keeps saying we will attack austria but he is 100 lying austria wont respond to my press i messed up with that retreat imma build in moscow
damn
they r letting me keep nwy
lets hope its not a stab but i dont think it is
we should coordinate orders i think germany plans to take burgundy so i am currently defending it and imagine any supports it gives will be cut
can bohemia head to munich to cut munich support though i want to get clever and see if i can get away with this move but it relies on munichs support being cut
also do you have any reads on england i could move into ska but only if im sure they wont attack

hello
hey
not a good read on england right now but he told me he wouldnt attack you if that helps
i would not move silesia to warsaw because you want to make sure ukraine has a valid retreat option
i dont think a supported move on munich will work right now but thats what id lean towards unless you want to do a tactical pull back with moscowlivonia ukrainemoscow and silesiawarsaw

silesia could also go to galicia
to cut support and hopefully keep ukraine

with ukraine supporting
